front.title: Path loss measurements versys prediction for long distance tropospheric scatter circuits

author.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.)

front.abstract: Tropospheric forward scatter circuits have established their place in the world-wide communications network of the military and it is the intent of this paper to illustrate by a specific example how the performance of a circuit of this type may be predicted with adequate accuracy without making costly transmission loss measurements over the intended path.
